data.text: @AT_Armstrong @GRBodescu @Uber @UberUK Give MyTaxi the Black Cab App a go. Safe professional drivers with the knowledge, and no surge pricing, plus Fixed Fares too and from Airports. Promo code 3767GT gets you £15 off your first fare. Take care, be lucky. https://t.co/Q6HtDfyrQ6
